Package ussr.robotbuildingblocks

Building blocks for constructing simulation scenarios.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GeometryDescription Common interface for geometry descriptions (that can be used for building a robot)
Robot An abstract description of what a robot is: a description of the hardware and an implementation of a controller.
WorldDescription.TextureDescription A physics-engine independent description of a texture that can be loaded from a file
 

Class Summary
AtronShape A description of an ATRON half geometry, currently only includes a radius.
BoxDescription A box-shaped obstacle that can be placed in the simulation
BoxShape A description of a box geometry for use in building a robot
ConeShape A description of a cone geometry for use in building a robot
CylinderShape A description of a cylinder geometry for use in building a robot
Description Common superclass for descriptions.
ModuleConnection A connection between two modules
ModulePosition Global starting position of a module and annotations for the module
ReceivingDevice Abstract description of a receiving device
RobotDescription A description of the geometry of a complete robot module, including the shape of the core, the shape of a connector, and the positions of the connectors and their range.
RotationDescription A physics-engine independent representation of a rotation TODO: make it physics engine independent :-)
SphereShape A description of a sphere geometry, for building a robot
TransmissionDevice Abstract description of a transmission device
VectorDescription A physics-engine independent description of a vector.
WorldDescription The description of a world in which a number of robot modules can be placed for the simulation.
 

Enum Summary
RobotDescription.ConnectorType The connector type used on the robot TODO: support multiple connector types if the need every arises
RobotDescription.PhysicsCompositionStructure Abstract description of how the robot is assembled TODO: not currently used, remove?
WorldDescription.CameraPosition Default camera positions
 

Package ussr.robotbuildingblocks Description

Building blocks for constructing simulation scenarios. Can describe module components in terms of their basic geometries, connections between modules, and the setup of the enclosing world. The module geometries must be translated into physics engine specific shapes by the corresponding module factory. TODO: Remove references to JME data types (quaternions, matrices, etc.)

See Also:
ussr.physics.PhysicsParameters for where to set simulation parameters, ussr.physics.ModuleFactory for the module factory interface
